pages.text:
The Scribing Desk can be used to put the knowledge uncovered from arcane relics into some practical usage...
Spell type Stone Tablets can be used with the desk to create ancient spell books.

pages.title: Scribing Desk
pages.text: The Scribing Desk can be crafted at a crafting table

The Scribing Desk has 7 item slots. $(br)- The top left slot is for relics like stone tablets. $(br)- The bottom left slot is for Magic Crystals. $(br)- The book slot in the middle is for an empty, regular Book. $(br) - The bottom right slot is for Ink. $(br) -The three slots in the middle are for ingredients.
